battle_traits.name: Masters of the Wilderness
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Beasts of Chaos unit that has not been deployed.
battle_traits.effect:
Set up that unit in reserve in ambush. It has now been deployed.

Designer’s Note: Any number of friendly Beasts of Chaos units can start the battle in reserve – even your entire Beasts of Chaos army!

battle_traits.name: Rituals of Ruin
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battle_traits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

Warping Curse: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of a friendly Beasts of Chaos Hero or, if there is a friendly Beasts of Chaos Hero in reserve, within 12" of a battlefield edge to be the target. Then, roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

Brand of Wild Fury: Pick a friendly Beasts of Chaos unit wholly within 12" of a friendly Beasts of Chaos Hero or, if there is a friendly Beasts of Chaos Hero in reserve, wholly within 12" of a battlefield edge to be the target. Then, roll a dice. On a 2+, the target has Ward (6+) for the rest of the turn.

Bestial Instinct: Pick a friendly Beasts of Chaos unit wholly within 12" of a friendly Beasts of Chaos Hero or, if there is a friendly Beasts of Chaos Hero in reserve, wholly within 12" of a battlefield edge to be the target. Then, roll a dice. On a 2+, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

battle_traits.name: Beastherd Ambush
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Beasts of Chaos unit that is in ambush.
battle_traits.effect:
Set up that unit on the battlefield wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

For the rest of the turn, add 1 to charge rolls for that unit.

Almighty Beastherd.name: Arch-Despoilers
Almighty Beastherd.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Beasts of Chaos units that target an enemy unit that is contesting an objective you do not control.

Hungering Warherd.name: Bloodgreed
Hungering Warherd.declare: Pick each friendly Warherd unit that used a Fight ability this turn to be the targets.

Marauding Brayherd.name: Fiends of the Wilds
Marauding Brayherd.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a Charge ability for a friendly Brayherd unit
Marauding Brayherd.effect: Change one of the dice in the charge roll to a 4.

Thunderscorn Stormherd.name: Raging Storm
Thunderscorn Stormherd.declare: Pick each friendly Thunderscorn unit on the battlefield to be the friendly targets, then pick each enemy unit in combat with any friendly Thunderscorn units to be the enemy targets.
Thunderscorn Stormherd.effect: Heal (1) each friendly target. Then, roll a D3 for each enemy target, if any. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the enemy target equal to the roll.

heroic_traits.name: Propagator of Ruin
heroic_traits.effect: While this unit is on the battlefield, you can use the ‘Rituals of Ruin’ ability twice per turn in your hero phase instead of once per turn. You cannot pick the same effect more than once per turn.

heroic_traits.name: Bestial Cunning
heroic_traits.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly Beasts of Chaos units wholly within 12" of this unit that were set up this turn using the ‘Beastherd Ambush’ ability to be the targets.
heroic_traits.effect: Each target can immediately move D3". The targets cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

heroic_traits.name: Death-grip
heroic_traits.activation: Once Per Turn, Reaction: Opponent declared a Shoot ability that targeted a friendly Beasts of Chaos unit
heroic_traits.effect: If that friendly Beasts of Chaos unit is not in combat and is wholly within 18" of this unit, after the Shoot ability has been resolved, that friendly unit can move 2D6". It can move into combat.

artefacts_of_power.name: Gnarlstaff of Morghur
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, ward rolls cannot be made for the target for the rest of the turn.

artefacts_of_power.name: Brayblast Trumpet
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick a friendly non-Unique Beasts of Chaos Infantry or Cavalry unit that started the battle with 2 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts_of_power.name: Slitherwrack Helm
artefacts_of_power.effect: Subtract 1 from charge rolls for enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

Lore of the Twisted Wilds.name: Vicious Stranglethorns
Lore of the Twisted Wilds.declare: Pick a friendly Beasts of Chaos Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of the Twisted Wilds.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

• Halve the target’s Move characteristic.
• Subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

Lore of the Twisted Wilds.name: Devolve
Lore of the Twisted Wilds.declare: Pick a friendly Beasts of Chaos Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy non-Hero unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of the Twisted Wilds.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

• The target unit has a maximum control score of 1.
• The target cannot use commands.
• Each time the target moves, it must end that move closer to the caster.

Lore of the Twisted Wilds.name: Viletide
Lore of the Twisted Wilds.declare: Pick a friendly Beasts of Chaos Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of the Twisted Wilds.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. In addition, until the start of your next turn, the target cannot use commands.

Bestial Manifestations.name: Summon Wildfire Taurus
Bestial Manifestations.declare: If there is not a friendly Wildfire Taurus on the battlefield, pick a friendly Beasts of Chaos Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Bestial Manifestations.effect: Set up a Wildfire Taurus wholly within 18" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Bestial Manifestations.name: Summon Doomblast Dirgehorn
Bestial Manifestations.declare: If there is not a friendly Doomblast Dirgehorn on the battlefield, pick a friendly Beasts of Chaos Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Bestial Manifestations.effect: Set up a Doomblast Dirgehorn wholly within 18" of the caster.

Bestial Manifestations.name: Summon Ravening Direflock
Bestial Manifestations.declare: If there is not a friendly Ravening Direflock on the battlefield, pick a friendly Beasts of Chaos Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Bestial Manifestations.effect: Set up a Ravening Direflock wholly within 18" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units. A Ravening Direflock has 3 parts that must each be set up within 1" of at least 1 other part.

warscrolls.name: Great Bray-Shaman

abilities.name: Infuse With Bestial Vigour
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Beasts of Chaos unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, the target can use a Run ability and still use Charge abilities later in the turn.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Ungors

abilities.name: Fleet of Hoof
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect:
When a number of damage points equal to this Manifestation’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this Manifestation is destroyed and all of its parts are removed from play.

Each time this Manifestation moves, each of its parts must end within 1" of at least 1 other part.

Each part of this Manifestation is armed with Murderous Beaks.

abilities.name: Harbingers of Dark Omens
abilities.effect: Subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Dragon Ogor Shaggoth

abilities.name: Scion of the Primordial Storm
abilities.activation: Reaction: Opponent declared a Spell ability
abilities.effect: If this unit or a friendly Dragon Ogors unit wholly within 12" of this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 4+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit or that friendly unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per Spell ability.

abilities.name: Beneath The Tempest
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, Heal (X) this unit, where X is an amount equal to the roll. Then, roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Bullgors

abilities.name: Warherd Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit. For each 2+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Ghorgon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Butchering Blades is 4.

abilities.name: Swallow Whole
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic:

• 1 model in the target unit is slain.
• Heal (X) this unit, where X is an amount equal to the roll.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Doombull

abilities.name: Alpha Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Slaughterer's Call
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Warherd unit that is not in combat and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Beasts of Chaos Chaos Spawn

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Razorgor

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Feed On Mangled Remains
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a Fight ability, after that Fight ability has been resolved, Heal (D3) this unit.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

abilities.name: Entropic Lodestone
abilities.effect:
From the second battle round onwards, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Beasts of Chaos units while they are wholly within 24" of this terrain feature.

If this terrain feature is wholly within 18" of the centre of the battlefield, this ability affects all friendly Beasts of Chaos units on the battlefield instead of those wholly within 24" of it.

abilities.name: Trail of Destruction
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the unmodified charge roll. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If any damage points are allocated to the target by this ability, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Centigors

abilities.name: Drunken Revelry
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.effect: This unit can use this ability if it is not in combat. It has Ward (4+) for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Bestigors

abilities.name: Despoilers
abilities.activation: Reaction: Opponent declared the ‘All-out Defence’ command for a unit within 6" of this unit
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Despoiler Axes for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Ferocious Advance
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Dragon Ogors

abilities.name: Speed Of An Avalanche
abilities.effect: If this unit did not charge this turn and is in combat with an enemy unit that charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 4+, this unit has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

abilities.name: Louder and Louder
abilities.effect: Increase the range of this Manifestation’s ‘Booming Cacophony’ ability by 6". This effect can be applied multiple times to this Manifestation and is cumulative. If this Manifestation is removed from play, this effect no longer applies.

abilities.name: Booming Cacophony
abilities.effect: When this Manifestation is set up, the range of this ability is 6". Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are within range of this Manifestation’s ability.

warscrolls.name: Cockatrice

abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army,) Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If any damage points are allocated to the target by this ability, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Ungor Raiders

abilities.name: Hidden Volley
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is in reserve in ambush, pick a non-Hero enemy unit within 12" of a battlefield edge to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in this unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. Then, in your next movement phase, set up this unit on the battlefield. If it is not possible to do so, it is destroyed.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Tuskgor Chariots

abilities.name: Tuskgor Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Cygor

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Massive Horns is 4.

abilities.name: Soul-eater
abilities.effect: This unit can use Unbind abilities as if it had Wizard (1). Each time this unit unbinds a spell, inflict D3 mortal damage on the caster.

abilities.name: Consume Endless Spell
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an Endless Spell within 9" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll 2D6. If the roll exceeds the target’s Banishment characteristic:

• The target is banished.
• Heal (X) this unit, where X is an amount equal to the roll.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Jabberslythe

abilities.name: Aura of Madness
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Roll a D3. On a 2+, pick up to a number of enemy units equal to the roll that are within 9" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, each time the unmodified hit roll for a combat attack made by the target is 1, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target after the Fight ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Gargant

abilities.name: Whipped Into A Frenzy
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is within 6" of any friendly Beasts of Chaos Heroes, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Timberrrrr!
abilities.effect: When this unit is destroyed, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of this unit. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than this unit.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Warhounds

abilities.name: Outrunners of Chaos
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared a Charge ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Change one of the dice in the charge roll to a 4.

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Chimera

abilities.name: Thricefold Savagery
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: Roll 3 dice. For each 4+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Chimeric Heads for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Grashrak's Despoilers

abilities.name: Grashrak Fellhoof
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Grashrak Fellhoof is on the battlefield, it has Wizard (1).

abilities.name: Violent Despoilers
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s attacks while it is wholly outside friendly territory.

warscrolls.notes: This unit cannot be reinforced.

warscrolls.name: Beastlord

abilities.name: Hatred of Heroes
abilities.effect: While this unit is in combat with any enemy Heroes, add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Beasts of Chaos units wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Call of Battle
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Brayherd Infantry unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.

warscrolls.name: Gors

abilities.name: Gor Stampede
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy non-Hero Infantry unit that has fewer models than this unit and is within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.notes: This unit will move to Warhammer Legends on 1 June 2025.
